scripts.prebuild: rm dist/* ./*.js ./*.js.map ./*.css.map ./*.css || true && cp ../KartoGraphICaching/data/runSets.json ../KartoGraphICaching/data/timezoneMap.json ../KartoGraphICaching/data/SPARQLFeatureDescriptions.json dist/data && cp ../KartoGraphICaching/data/cache/* dist/data || true
scripts.postbuild: sed 's/\/index\./\.\/index\./g' dist/index.html > dist/index.tmp.html && rm dist/index.html || true && mv dist/index.tmp.html dist/index.html
scripts.postdeploy: sed 's/\/index\./\.\/index\./g' dist/index.html > index.html && rm dist/index.html || true && mv dist/* .
scripts.predev: rm dist/* || true && rm dist/data/* || true && cp ../KartoGraphICaching/data/runSets.json ../KartoGraphICaching/data/timezoneMap.json ../KartoGraphICaching/data/SPARQLFeatureDescriptions.json dist/data && cp ../KartoGraphICaching/data/cache/* dist/data  || true
